notes: masculine noun of Greek origin; plural ends -mi

example_sentence_italian: Ho dei problemi con il computer.
example_sentence_english: I have some problems with the computer.
The origin of the problem is unknown.

example_sentence_italian: Dobbiamo trovare una soluzione al problema.
example_sentence_english: We must find a solution to the problem.
There are solutions to the problems.
You have learned from past problems.
There is a contradiction in the problem.
In complex problems you need calmness.

example_sentence_italian: Ho scritto un articolo sul problema.
example_sentence_english: I wrote an article about the problem.

example_sentence_italian: Ci sono dati sui problemi locali.
example_sentence_english: There is data about local problems.

example_sentence_italian: Devi fare i conti col problema.
example_sentence_english: You must deal with the problem.

example_sentence_italian: Non riesco a lavorare coi problemi tecnici.
example_sentence_english: I cannot work with technical problems.
